dataset.name: Detail
dataset.description: Details page for Case Search and Court Date Search

schedule.indexing-mode: Incremental Indexing with Thorough Deletion Detection

dataquery.name: WorkingQueue
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT CASE_ID AS 'CaseID', CASE_NUMBER AS 'CaseNumber', COURT_CD AS 'CourtType', CASE_CATEGORY_TYP_CD AS 'CategoryType', CASE_TYP_CD AS 'CaseType', COMMENCEDBY AS 'CommencedBy', CONVERT(varchar(10), CASE_FILING_DT, 101) AS 'CaseFilingDate', CASE_FILING_TYP_CD AS 'FilingType', CASE_STATUS_DESCR AS 'CaseStatus', CASE_JUDGE AS 'CaseJudge', CASE_STYLE AS 'CaseStyle', CASE_RESTRICTED AS 'Confidential', CASE_SEALED AS 'Sealed', DATE_TIME_MOD FROM ACM_V_ESCASEDETAIL WHERE VOID = 'N' AND (CASE_SEALED= 'N' AND CASE_RESTRICTED = 'N') AND COURT_CD IN ('CRIMINAL', 'CIVIL') ORDER BY DATE_TIME_MOD DESC

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT CASE_ID AS 'CaseID', PARTY_ID AS 'PartyID', PARTY_ROLE_DESC AS 'DetailPartyRole', DISPLAYNAME AS 'DetailDisplayName', ATTORNEY_NAME AS 'Attorney', ATTORNEY_TYPE AS 'AttorneyRole', PARTY_SEQ AS 'PartySequence', PERSON_ALIAS_ID AS 'SPN' FROM ACM_V_ESPARTYDETAIL WHERE (CASE_SEALED <> 'Y' AND PERSON_SEALED <> 'Y' AND PARTY_RESTRICTED <> 'Y' AND CASE_RESTRICTED <> 'Y') AND CASE_VOID <> 'Y' AND PARTY_VOID <> 'Y' AND PARTY_ROLE_DESC IN ('CITY ATTORNEY', 'PLAINTIFF', 'DEFENDANT', 'PROSECUTOR', 'PUBLIC DEFENDER', 'RETAINED-DEFENDANT', 'RETAINED-PLAINTIFF', 'WAIVED', 'WITNESS', 'NON PARTY DEFENDANT', 'NON PARTY PLAINTIFF', 'OTHER') AND COURT_CD IN ('CRIMINAL', 'CIVIL') AND CASE_ID IN (?) ORDER BY PARTY_SEQ

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT PARTY_ID AS 'PartyID', CHARGE_ID AS 'ChargeID', CONVERT(varchar(10), OFFENSE_DT_FRM , 112) AS 'OffenseDate', DISPOSITION_DT AS 'DispositionDate', PLEA_DATE AS 'PleaDate', CHARGE_SEQ AS 'ChargeSequence', ISAMENDED_FLG 'AmendedFlg', DISPOSITION_BY_DESC AS 'DispositionBy', DISPOSITION_DESC AS 'Disposition', PLEA_DESC AS 'Plea', OFFENSE_CLASS_DESC AS 'OffenseClass', OFFENSE_TYP_DESC AS 'OffenseType', ENF_AGENCY_DESC AS 'ArrestingAgency', STATUTE_ID AS 'StatuteId', OTN AS 'OTN', DOCUMENT_CONTROL_NUM AS 'DocumentControlNumber', CCRE_STATUS_TYP_DESC AS 'CCREStatus', VV_DESC AS 'VCC', CHARGE_DESC AS 'ChargeDescription', CHARGE_FILING_DT AS 'ArrestDate', CHARGE_COMMENCEDBY AS 'ChargeCommencedBy', OFFENSE_REF_NUM AS 'OffenseRefNum', CHARGE_COUNT AS 'ChargeCount', CHARGE_STATUS_DESC AS 'ChargeStatus', JURISDICTION_DESC AS 'Jurisdiction', PREP_OFFENSE_DESC AS 'PrepOffense', INCARCER_DESC AS 'IncarcerationLocation', LEN_YEARS AS 'LengthYears', LEN_MONTHS AS 'LengthMonths', LEN_DAYS AS 'LengthDays', LEN_HOURS AS 'LengthHours', SUS_YEARS AS 'SuspendedYears', SUS_MON AS 'SuspendedMonths', SUS_DAYS AS 'SuspendedDays', SUS_HOURS AS 'SuspendedHours', LIFE_FLG AS 'Life', DEATH_FLG AS 'Death', ISAMENDED_FLG AS 'AmendedIncarceration', COMMENTS AS 'IncarcerationComments', CHARGE_COUNT AS 'IncarcerationCount' FROM ACM_V_ESCHARGEDETAIL WHERE PARTY_ID IN (?) AND (DELETED_FLG IS NULL OR DELETED_FLG <> 'Y') AND (CASE_SEALED <> 'Y' AND PERSON_SEALED <> 'Y' AND PARTY_RESTRICTED <> 'Y' AND CASE_RESTRICTED <> 'Y') AND CASE_VOID <> 'Y' AND PARTY_VOID <> 'Y' AND COURT_CD IN ('CRIMINAL', 'CIVIL') ORDER BY CHARGE_COUNT

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT CONVERT(varchar(20), SESSIONDATE,107) + ' ' + LTRIM(RIGHT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), SESSIONDATE, 100), 7)) AS 'SessionDate', COMMENT_TEXT AS 'SchedulingComment', REASON AS 'AppearanceReason', HEARING_DESC AS 'HearingResult', DISPLAYNAME AS 'ScheduledParty', CLERKNAME AS 'Clerk', SCHEDULED_CHARGE AS 'ScheduledCharge', PARTY_ID AS 'PartyID' FROM ACM_V_ESSCHEDULINGDETAIL WHERE (CASE_SEALED <> 'Y' AND PERSON_SEALED <> 'Y' AND PARTY_RESTRICTED <> 'Y' AND CASE_RESTRICTED <> 'Y') AND CASE_VOID <> 'Y' AND PARTY_VOID <> 'Y' AND PARTY_ROLE_DESC IN ('PLAINTIFF', 'DEFENDANT') AND COURT_CD IN ('CRIMINAL', 'CIVIL') AND PARTY_ID IN (?) ORDER BY SESSIONDATE

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT DOCUMENT_STORAGE_ID AS 'DocumentID', FILENAME AS 'DocumentFileName', CREATED_DATE AS 'DocumentCreatedDate', MODIFIED_DATE AS 'DocumentModifiedDate', FILE_PROVIDER_ID AS 'FileID', CASE_ID AS 'CaseID', EXTERNAL_DMS_ID AS 'DMSID' FROM ACM_V_ESDOCUMENTDETAIL WHERE FILE_PROVIDER_ID IN (524) AND SEALED_DOC_FLG <> 'Y' AND DELETE_FLG <> 'Y' AND IS_RESTRICTED_FLG <> 'Y' AND IS_VOID <> 'Y' AND CASE_ID IN (?) ORDER BY CREATED_DATE

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT APPEARANCE_DT AS 'AppearanceDate', PARTY_NAME AS 'ServiceParty', ISSUE_DT AS 'IssueDate', SERVED_DT AS 'ServiceDate', HOW_SERVED_DESC AS 'HowServed', EVENT_ENT_TYP_DESC AS 'ServiceDescription', COMMENTS AS 'ServiceComments', PARTY_ID AS 'PartyID' FROM ACM_V_ESSERVICEDETAIL WHERE (CASE_SEALED <> 'Y' AND PERSON_SEALED <> 'Y' AND PARTY_RESTRICTED <> 'Y' AND CASE_RESTRICTED <> 'Y') AND CASE_VOID <> 'Y' AND PARTY_VOID <> 'Y' AND EVENT_VOID <> 'Y' AND RESTRICTED_EVENT <> 'Y' AND SEALED_EVENT <> 'Y' AND PARTY_ROLE_DESC IN ('CITY ATTORNEY', 'PLAINTIFF', 'DEFENDANT', 'NON PARTY DEFENDANT', 'NON PARTY PLAINTIFF', 'OTHER', 'RETAINED-PLAINTIFF', 'WAIVED', 'WITNESS') AND COURT_CD IN ('CRIMINAL', 'CIVIL') AND PARTY_ID IN (?) ORDER BY ISSUE_DT

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT CASE_ID AS 'CaseID', CONVERT(varchar(20), ROAFILINGDATE, 101) AS 'ROAFilingDate', CONVERT(varchar(20), ROAFILINGDATE, 109) AS 'ROAFilingDateOrder', ROAPARTY AS 'ROAParty', ROADESCRIPTION AS 'ROADescription', ROACOMMENT AS 'ROAComment', USER_ID AS 'UserID' FROM ACM_V_ESROADETAIL WHERE (CASE_SEALED <> 'Y' AND (PERSON_SEALED = 'N' OR PERSON_SEALED IS NULL) AND (PARTY_RESTRICTED = 'N' OR PARTY_RESTRICTED IS NULL) AND CASE_RESTRICTED <> 'Y') AND CASE_VOID <> 'Y' AND (PARTY_VOID = 'N' OR PARTY_VOID IS NULL) AND EVENT_VOID <> 'Y' AND RESTRICTED_EVENT <> 'Y' AND SEALED_EVENT <> 'Y' AND COURT_CD IN ('CRIMINAL', 'CIVIL') AND PARTY_ROLE_DESC NOT IN ('ADOPTEE', 'APPLICANT', 'COURT APPOINTED', 'GUARDIAN AD LITEM', 'MINOR', 'MISCELLANEOUS', 'NON CONFIRMED', 'NONE', 'PETITIONER', 'PROSECUTOR', 'PUBLIC DEFENDER') AND ROA_HIDDEN <> 'Y' AND EVENT_ENTRY_TYP_ID IN ('200330', '200333', '200339', '200350','200361','200363','200407','200397') AND CASE_ID IN (?) ORDER BY ROAFILINGDATEORDER, ROADESCRIPTION

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT SPN AS 'SPN', ISNULL(RTRIM(LAST_NAME),'')+' '+ ISNULL(RTRIM(SUFFIX_NAME),'')+', ' + ISNULL(RTRIM(FIRST_NAME),'')+' '+ISNULL(RTRIM(MIDDLE_NAME),'') AS 'DefendantName', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM((CONVERT(varchar(10), datepart(month,dob))))) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL((CONVERT(varchar(10), datepart(month,dob))), '|') END AS DOBMonth, CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM((CONVERT(varchar(10), datepart(day,dob))))) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL((CONVERT(varchar(10), datepart(day,dob))), '|') END AS DOBDay, CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(SEX)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(SEX, '|') END AS 'Sex', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CITY_NAME)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CITY_NAME, '|') END AS 'City', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(STATE_NAME)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(STATE_NAME, '|') END AS 'State' FROM ACM_V_ESPARTYSEARCH WHERE (CASE_SEALED = 'N' AND PERSON_SEALED = 'N' AND CASE_RESTRICTED = 'N' AND PARTY_RESTRICTED = 'N') AND CASE_VOID = 'N' AND PARTY_VOID = 'N' AND PARTY_ROLE_DESC IN ('DEFENDANT') AND COURT_CD IN ('CRIMINAL') AND SPN IN (?)

dataquery.name: Deletion
dataquery.sql: SELECT RT.TAB_PK_KEY FROM ROAM_TRACK RT WHERE RT.DATE_TIME_MOD > DATEADD(mi, -10, GETDATE()) AND RT.DML_TYP IN ('D', 'U') AND RT.TAB_NAME = 'ACM_FACTS_CASE' UNION ALL SELECT CASE_ID FROM ACM_V_ESCASEDETAIL ES INNER JOIN ROAM_TRACK RT ON ES.CASE_ID = RT.PK_KEY WHERE RT.DATE_TIME_MOD > DATEADD(mi, -10, GETDATE()) AND RT.DML_TYP IN ('D', 'U') AND (ES.CASE_SEALED = 'Y' OR ES.CASE_RESTRICTED = 'Y' OR ES.VOID = 'Y')

dataquery.name: Incremental
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT CASE_ID AS 'CaseID', CASE_NUMBER AS 'CaseNumber', COURT_CD AS 'CourtType', CASE_CATEGORY_TYP_CD AS 'CategoryType', CASE_TYP_CD AS 'CaseType', COMMENCEDBY AS 'CommencedBy', CONVERT(varchar(10), CASE_FILING_DT, 101) AS 'CaseFilingDate', CASE_FILING_TYP_CD AS 'FilingType', CASE_STATUS_DESCR AS 'CaseStatus', CASE_JUDGE AS 'CaseJudge', CASE_STYLE AS 'CaseStyle', CASE_RESTRICTED AS 'Confidential', CASE_SEALED AS 'Sealed', RT.DATE_TIME_MOD FROM ACM_V_ESCASEDETAIL FC INNER JOIN ROAM_TRACK RT ON FC.CASE_ID = RT.PK_KEY WHERE VOID = 'N' AND (CASE_SEALED= 'N' AND CASE_RESTRICTED = 'N') AND COURT_CD IN ('CRIMINAL', 'CIVIL') AND RT.DML_TYP IN ('I', 'U') AND (RT.DATE_TIME_MOD > ? OR RT.DATE_TIME_MOD > DATEADD(mi, -15, GETDATE())) ORDER BY RT.DATE_TIME_MOD DESC
